fields.name: Furioso
fields.description: You accept a mission to track down a band of smugglers operating out of a nearby town. You quickly realize you're in way over your head.
fields.full_description:
You accept a mission to track down a band of smugglers operating out of a nearby town. Now you've been kidnapped and you must fight your way out of a sinking ship.

This adventure is notable for a rising water death trap and a few other surprises. Tough adventurers skilled in fighting with makeshift clubs will have a chance. All others will be shark bait.
fields.intro_text:
{{name}}, you've made a big mistake.

When you recently accepted a mission to find the contact of a band of smugglers in a strange city, you did not think you would end up this bad off.

As you strolled along the docks last night trying to pick up information on the smugglers, you stopped off at a local tavern and made the mistake of ordering a drink.

It's not that the drink tasted bad, or that it made you sick.  It's that the drink was drugged!  Your last memory was of a smiling, fat-jowled barkeep with deep red hair.

"Drink up, me fine friend," he said as he slapped you on the back. The world started to weave and he then "helped" you into the back room.

fields.name: You are in the brig.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a room made of very rough wood.  It seems to be fitted out as a detention area of some kind, with chains and manacles attached to the walls.  There is an unlocked door in the north wall.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west corridor.  Salt water covers the floor and seems to be rising.  The walls are made of rough wood, and there are doors to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: The corridor extends to the east.  Warm salt water covers the floor and it seems to be rising.  To the west is a door.

fields.name: You are in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: The corridor extends to the east.  Warm salt water covers the floor, and it seems to be rising.  To the east is a door.

fields.name: You are in a small closet.  (E)
fields.description: The only door is to the east.  Warm salt water covers the floor and, and it seems to be rising.  You notice scratch marks on the floor of the north wall.

fields.name: You are in the lower hold.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a fairly large room filled with crates and boxes.  There is a door in the north wall and another in the south wall.  The water, seems to be rising.

fields.name: You are in a small closet.  (W)
fields.description: The only door is to the west.  Warm salt water covers the floor and, and it seems to be rising.  You notice scratch marks on the floor of the north wall.

fields.name: You are in a secret north/south passage.
fields.description: This passage is littered with years of accumulated junk, all worthless.  Water covers the floor and is rising.

fields.name: You are in a secret north/south passage.
fields.description: This area is used to store some of the ship's equipment (most of it is broken and useless).  Rising water covers the floor.

fields.name: You are in the statue room.  (E/NE)
fields.description: You are in a room filled with weird statues.  The salt water that covers the floor is giving off a strange glow which illuminates the room.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection; south by E/W
fields.description: You are at the end of a short passage.  The salt water is glowing here, and it's enough to reveal the details of the room.

fields.name: You are in the chapel.  (W/NW)
fields.description: You are in a makeshift chapel.  There are doors to the west and northwest.  Along the east wall is a wooden altar.  Two kneelers face the altar, now underwater.  The water glows enough to cast a dim light.

fields.name: You are in the temporary brig.  (N/SE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a room fitted out as a temporary brig. Shackles and chains have been hurriedly attached to the walls. There are doors to the north, southeast, and southwest.

fields.name: You are in the forward hold.  (S/U/D)
fields.description: You see that this is where the ship ran aground.  You can see a large gaping hole in the floor.  There is a ladder leading upward and a door in the south wall.

fields.name: You are swimming in the ocean.
fields.description: The ocean water is murky and, since it is night, it is hard to see which direction holds land.

fields.name: You are in a short hallway.  (S/D)
fields.description: You are at the end of a short hallway.  At the north end is a ladder leading down, and there is a room to the south.  You see a large lever on one wall.

fields.name: You are in secret west closet.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small secret closet.  The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in east secret closet.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a secret storage closet.  The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in the compass room.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a perfectly square room with exits in all four directions.  To the north is the short passage to the ladder down.  The door to the south is barred from this side.

fields.name: You are in the upper cargo hold.  (N/U)
fields.description: You are in the upper cargo hold.  It is filled with boxes and crates of trade goods.  There is a door to the north and a set of stairs winds upward.

fields.name: You are north of the galley slaves.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a large room.  To the east is a door, and to the south you can see bench after bench filled with oarsmen.

fields.name: You are at the north end of the galley.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a large room.  To the west is a door, and to the south you can see row after row of galley slaves.

fields.name: You are in west galley.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the west side of the galley.  Benches filled with oarsmen line the walls.  You can go north or south.

fields.name: You are in east galley.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the east side of the galley.  Benches filled with oarsmen line the walls.  You can go north or south.

fields.name: You are in the SW corner of the galley.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in the southwest corner of the galley.  Benches line the west wall.  You can go north past more oarsman or east through a door.

fields.name: You are in the SE corner of the galley.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in the southeast corner of the galley.  Benches line the east wall.  You can go north past more oarsman or west through a door.

fields.name: You are on a small platform.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a platform with galley slaves on their benches to both the east and west.  You can go south through a door.

fields.name: You are in the bunk room.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a room lined with bunks.  There are doors to the north and west.  You notice a poster of a scantily clad woman on the south wall.

fields.name: You are in a small secret closet.  (N)
fields.description: You are crowded into a small secret storage area.  You notice the paneling on the west wall is a different color than the rest.

fields.name: You are in another secret storage area.  (E)
fields.description: You are in another secret storage area, this one hidden under the stairs.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of some stairs.  (E/U)
fields.description: You see a narrow and rickety staircase extending upward.  There is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are at the top of the stairs.  (W/D)
fields.description: You are at the top of a narrow and rickety staircase.  There is a door to the west.

fields.name: You are in the Captain's cabin.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a fancy cabin.  Carved wood graces the walls and a giant oak desk accessorizes this fancy room.  Doors lead north and east.

fields.name: You are in a secret closet.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a tiny secret closet in the Captain's cabin.

fields.name: You are on the deck.  (N/S/E/W/D)
fields.description: You are on the deck of the sinking ship.  Light from a flickering volcano illuminates the area.  To the north is the ship's bow, south is a door, and east and west is the ocean.  A set of stairs leads down into darkness.

fields.name: You are at the bow.  (N/S/E/W/U)
fields.description: You are at the bow of the ship.  The ship is aground on a shore of hardened lava.  A splintered, but intact mast reaches upwards to the black clouds.  To the north is a thick jungle, with a worn path along the shore.

fields.name: You are in the crows nest.  (D)
fields.description: You are at the top of the mast in the crows nest.  To the north you can see a nearly impenetrable jungle.  Along the shore to the east you can see what may be a small village with some ships at a dock!

fields.name: You are on the shore by the sinking ship.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are on the rough shore of hardened lava.  You see the rapidly sinking ship.  To the north is a thick, nearly impenetrable jungle.  A worn path leads east and west along the shore.

fields.name: You are on the shore.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The jungle to the north is even more impenetrable here.  The path continues east and west, and to the south is the ocean.

fields.name: You are at the shrine.  (S/E/NE)
fields.description: You are at a shrine made of lava rocks in the shape of a giant stone face. You have heard of the volcano god worshipped by some islanders off the coast of Eamon, and perhaps this is it. To the south is ocean. To the west and north is dense jungle, totally impassible. However, there is a faint trail leading into the underbrush to the northeast. The main trail heads east along the shore.

fields.name: You are on the shore.  (S/E/W/NW)
fields.description: You see ocean to the south, heavy jungle to the northwest, and a path leads east and west along the shore.  You can see the ship sinking into the sea to the southwest.

fields.name: You are west of the village.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a small village visible to the east.  Dark jungle is to the north and a sea to the south.  A worn path leads east and west along the shore.

fields.name: You are in the native village.  (S/E/W/NW)
fields.description: You are in a village of civilized natives.  The simple houses are thatched with bamboo leaves and built above the dirt on stilts.  To the northwest and east is jungle.  A path leads west along the shore, and there is a small dock to the south.

fields.name: You are lost in the jungle.
fields.description: You are lost in the jungle.

fields.name: You are lost in the jungle.
fields.description: You are lost in the jungle.

fields.name: You are lost in the jungle.
fields.description: You are lost in the jungle.

fields.name: You are lost in the jungle.
fields.description: You are lost in the jungle.

fields.name: You are on the dock.  (N/S/SE/SW)
fields.description: You are on a dock south of the native village.  There are three ships docked here.  They will all be sailing in the direction of the Main Hall soon.

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: You see an ordinary metal lantern.  It is almost out of fuel and will be going out soon.

fields.name: sack
fields.description: You see an ordinary canvas sack tied closed at the top with a piece of string.

fields.name: bottle
fields.description: You see a bottle that has drifted ashore.  It appears to have a piece of paper inside.

fields.name: belaying pin
fields.description: You see an ordinary wooden belaying pin.

fields.name: cutlass
fields.description: You see an old rusty cutlass.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: You see a small dagger with a wavy blade.  There is some writing on the handle.

fields.name: axe handle
fields.description: You see a brand-new axe handle.

fields.name: copper bowl
fields.description: You see a copper bowl about five feet in diameter.  It is filled with water.

fields.name: gems
fields.description: You see 16 valuable gems.  They were apparently designed to sit evenly around the rim of the large copper bowl.

fields.name: rope
fields.description: You see a 50' piece of rope.

fields.name: chalice
fields.description: You see a beautifully worked golden chalice shining dimly with a pale light.

fields.name: old chest
fields.description: You see an old battered chest made of wood with leather hinges.  There appears to be no lock.

fields.name: new chest
fields.description: You see a brand new chest that seems never to have been used for anything.

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: You see a scroll tied with a workman-like piece of string.

fields.name: clothing
fields.description: You see your clothing, but unfortunately not your armor.

fields.name: chain mail
fields.description: You see a full set of chain mail.  It's not your armor but it should fit.

fields.name: drum
fields.description: You see an old and well worn drum that was used to keep time for the oarsmen.

fields.name: mallet
fields.description: You see an old mallet that was used with the drum.

fields.name: cards
fields.description: You see a pack of playing cards with very strange designs and runes on the back.  There are a bunch of numbers and some writing on the front.

fields.name: harpoon
fields.description: You see an old harpoon.  It is covered with a slimy liquid.

fields.name: earring
fields.description: You see a small, delicate earring.  If belonged to a pirate then he sure was a strange pirate.

fields.name: hunting spear
fields.description: You see a wicked looking spear with 3 points about 6 inches apart.  The spear is made entirely of wood, but seems to be very effective.

fields.name: rocks
fields.description: You see a number of unusually shaped lava rocks.  They are a very weird color of red and black.

fields.name: RocKiller
fields.description: You see a bow of unusual native design.

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see a bow of standard design.

fields.name: broken bow
fields.description: You see a broken bow.

fields.name: short bow
fields.description: You see a bow that was made out of the rib bones of some sea creature.

fields.name: chain
fields.description: You see a coil of chain that was used to hold the ships anchor.  It glistens in the dim light.

fields.name: sail
fields.description: You see the torn and tattered sail.

fields.name: diamond
fields.description: You see a perfect looking diamond, about the size of a robin's egg.

fields.name: silk
fields.description: You see a bolt of pure silk ornamented with pure gold and silver threads.

fields.name: ruby eye
fields.description: You see a large ruby that was carved to resemble an eye.

fields.name: flower
fields.description: You see a small, but apparently very rare flower.

fields.name: rapier
fields.description: You see a fine, ornamented rapier.  It has some reddish material dried in the engravings.

fields.name: ankle deep water
fields.description: You see warm salt water covering the floor.  The water is rising slowly.

fields.name: knee deep water
fields.description: The water is now knee deep and still slowly rising.

fields.name: mid-thigh deep water
fields.description: The water is still slowly rising and is now at mid-thigh.

fields.name: waist deep water
fields.description: You are now in waist deep water and it still seems to be rising.

fields.name: chest deep water
fields.description: You are now in chest deep water and it seems to be rising even faster.

fields.name: dead squid
fields.description: You see a dead squid with tentacles floating in the inky water.

fields.name: Orlando's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Orlando lying before you.  The scar on his cheek no longer looks romantic, merely mundane.

fields.name: Blue Face's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Blue Face at your feet.  His face is even bluer in death than it was in life.

fields.name: Red Nose's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Red Nose sprawled out before you.  His nose is beginning to turn to a normal color (probably for the first time).

fields.name: damp spot
fields.description: You see the Guardian sink into nothing more than a damp spot on the floor.

fields.name: dead tiger
fields.description: You see the dead body of the tiger, its beautiful fur now spotted with blood and gore.

fields.name: Sea Breeze's body
fields.description: You see the now ordinary body of the very extraordinary Sea Breeze.

fields.name: Malagur's body
fields.description: You see the body of the sly and wily Malagur, his career of deceit and treachery now over.

fields.name: dead griffon
fields.description: You see the molting body of the griffon.

fields.name: Amazon's body
fields.description: You see the limp and lifeless body of the amazon.

fields.name: Native Chief's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of the Native Chief, his mud now cracked and unrepairable.

fields.name: a secret passage north
fields.description: You find a hidden switch that causes part of the north wall to slide open.

fields.name: a secret passage north
fields.description: You find a hidden switch that causes part of the north wall to slide open.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: You find a hidden button that causes part of the south wall to slide open.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: You find a hidden button that causes part of the south wall to slide open.

fields.name: a door to the east
fields.description: Pulling the lever causes a door to open to the east.

fields.name: a door to the west
fields.description: A second door has opened, to the west.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: You find a hidden button behind the poster that causes part of the south wall to slide open.

fields.name: a secret passage west
fields.description: You find a hidden wire that causes part of the west wall to slide open.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: You find a hidden button inside the desk that causes part of the south wall to slide open.

fields.name: secret message
fields.description: In the bottle is a half-soaked piece of paper with some writing on it.

fields.name: chains and manacles
fields.description: They are of standard design.

fields.name: chains and shackles
fields.description: They are of standard design.

fields.name: crates and boxes
fields.description: They are large wooden shipping crates.  They are also securely sealed.

fields.name: crates and boxes
fields.description: They are large wooden shipping crates.  They are also securely sealed.

fields.name: junk
fields.description: It's just a lot of garbage.

fields.name: equipment
fields.description: You see nothing that would be of any value to you.

fields.name: statues
fields.description: They are comprised of stone and very heavy.  One bears a striking resemblance to Elvis, the other JFK.

fields.name: altar
fields.description: The altar is poorly constructed.  A label reads "Manufactured by Interzone International Religious Supply Co.  BOX 6502 Main Island, INTERZONE"

fields.name: kneelers
fields.description: They are busy begging their respective deities to save them.

fields.name: glowing ball
fields.description: There is a sudden bright flash and a glowing ball appears in the room.  You can use it to see, and it has a convenient on/off switch.

fields.name: bag of gold
fields.description: You see your bag of gold that was stolen from you.

fields.text: To the south you see an ordinary looking passenger ship.  The crew is hard at work scrubbing the already spotless deck.
To the southeast you see a very expensive looking ship, painted white with gold trim.  It looks like the sort of ship a fancy lady might use.  The crew is nowhere to be seen.
To the southwest you see a run down fishing trawler that must be at least a hundred years old.  The crew is on deck drinking and playing cards.
The Captain of the ship is a rough master.  He works you hard but pays a fair wage.  Within two weeks you arrive back at the Main Hall.
The Captain of the ship is a rough and harsh master.  He makes you work your way home and charges you a fee of half your possessions.
The Captain of the ship is a kind master... At least he is kind until he decides to sell you into slavery!
You have been stripped of all your weapons and armor.  And speaking of stripped.....They took all your clothes too!

In a very fine script it says:

To my son, may he never use this except to cut his food.
ZAP-----!  A shock just ran up one arm and down the other!!!
Due to circumstances beyond your control, escape from a great white shark is impossible!
I don't know why you would want to, but you can't get the damp spot without a sponge.
As you take the gems from their setting a figure rises from the water in the bowl.
The writing is hard to make out but it seems to say:
All of your things glowed for a second, then went back to looking normal-- but something tells you their value increased!
It says:  "HELP I'M BEING HELD CAPTIVE ON TREASURE ISLAND!" and has a crude map.  It is signed, "GENZENBRAUN THE SAILOR".
The floor is covered with water which seems to be slowly rising...
From what you can make out, if you shuffle the deck then something strange (and possibly dangerous) may happen.  (USE cards to shuffle.)
There doesn't seem to be much in it, but at least it's not a mimic!

fields.name: Orlando
fields.description: You see a blond, heavily tanned man.  He has a long scar on his left cheek, giving him a sort of lopsided sneer.

fields.name: Lamprey
fields.description: You see a three ugly lampreys coming at you.

fields.name: Native Chief
fields.description: You see a tall native man. He is covered with a light tan mud that is shaped to give him unusual contours and features. Brightly covered feathers stick out of the mud at strange angles.

fields.name: Native
fields.description: You see three of the local natives. They are chanting and dancing in front of the volcano god statue.

fields.name: Rat
fields.description: You are assaulted by a pack of giant rats.

fields.name: Malagur
fields.description: You see an old, bent man dressed in a clerical robe. He was searching the Captain's desk when you first surprised him. He does not seem altogether unfriendly.

fields.name: Griffon
fields.description: You see an eagle-like bird with the head of a lion and very sharp talons.

fields.name: Amazon
fields.description: You see a tall, bronze colored woman dressed for hunting in nothing but a small loincloth.

fields.name: Snake
fields.description: You see an incredibly long snake coiling its way toward you with unbelievable speed.

fields.name: Barracuda
fields.description: You see two giant barracudas heading your way!

fields.name: Sea Breeze
fields.description: You see a lithe young woman with an other-worldly quality about her. Her hair and skin are almost too fair to be believable.

fields.name: Blue Face
fields.description: You see a pirate with a ring in one ear and a strange bluish tint to his face.

fields.name: Red Nose
fields.description: You see a pirate with flashy red and black clothes and a bright red nose that would make Rudolph the Reindeer weep.

fields.name: Tentacle
fields.description: You are assaulted by the tentacles of a large sea creature. Two hold you tight, while the other four try to disassemble your body.

fields.name: Great White Shark
fields.description: You see the frightening form of a great white shark.  It looks very hungry!

fields.name: Guardian
fields.description: You see a nearly-transparent warrior who seems to be made entirely of water.

fields.name: Tiger
fields.description: You see a hungry sabre tooth tiger charge at you.

fields.name: Oarsmen
fields.description: The oarsmen do not seem to know the ship is sinking, and keep rowing even though many hold broken oars.

fields.name: Oarsmen
fields.description: You see the oarsmen who, even though the ship is sinking, keep on rowing.  Many are even rowing with broken oars.

fields.question: Furioso -- How do I get out of the dark?
Furioso -- Which ship should I choose?

fields.answer: If you know the POWER spell, then cast it for a temporary fix.
There is also a lantern close by.  From the first room, go N, N, N, E, NW.

To find your weapons, you're going to have to find the various secret closets.  EXAMINE all the walls, levers, etc.  Also EXAMINE the Captain's desk and go for a swim.  Your armor will be waiting for you on the shore, and Red Nose has your gold.
If you cast POWER enough times, the water level should drop (this works up to four times).  But you're eventually going to have to get out of the lower hold before you drown.
They are pretty useful.  They can make a treasure appear, find secret passages, and other things.  They're also good for playing poker when the adventure is over.
You may want to keep your eye on him...
He's a sly, thieving crook.  He'll slowly rob you if you are friendly with him, but you'll eventually catch him.
Remember, looks can be deceiving.   Read on if you really want to know...
The ship to the southeast is the worst.  You will be sold into slavery and die.
The ship to the south will take you home, but charge you a hefty fee.
The old fishing boat to the southwest is the best.  You have to work your way home, but you'll get paid for it.

Not much was changed in this adventure.  I added the thieving wizard routine, which was hinted at but never done.  I also added all the embedded artifacts, the 10-direction mods, and made the cards and power spell less malevolent.  -FK
